Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: CURRENTLY FULLY LEASED: 21,000 SF, structural steel building, constructed in 2011. Includes 1,800 SF of office space, with mezzanine level storage above the office space. Fully sprinklered building, with 10-ton crane way and 25' to 29' ceiling height.

AVAILABLE FOR LEASE: 13,000 SF, structural steel building, constructed in 2008. Includes 1,500 SF of office space, with mezzanine level storage above the office space. Two (2) oversized 12' w x 14' h, drive-in garage doors. 25.75' ceiling height.

CURRENTLY FULLY LEASED: 18,000 SF, structural steel building, constructed in 1992; renovated in 2010. Includes 4,296 SF of office space, with mezzanine level storage above the office space. 10-ton crane way and 32' ceiling height.

CURRENTLY FULLY LEASED: 14,000 SF, structural steel building, constructed in 2012. Includes 5,250 SF of office space, with mezzanine level storage above the office space. Two 5-ton crane ways and 27.5' ceiling height.

CURRENTLY FULLY LEASED: 12,000 SF, structural steel building, constructed in 2013. Includes 1,875 SF of office space, with mezzanine level storage above the office space. Fully sprinklered building with 26.75' to 32.75' ceiling height.

CURRENTLY FULLY LEASED: 14,000 SF, structural steel building, constructed in 2011. Includes 2,168 SF of office space, with mezzanine level storage above the office space. Fully sprinklered building with 24' ceiling height.
CURRENTLY FULLY LEASED: 13,000 SF, structural steel building, constructed in 2014. Includes 2,100 SF of office space, with mezzanine level storage above the office space. 30' ceiling height.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 7 industrial flex buildings (total 105,000 SF); 6 buildings are currently fully occupied
Home to USA Compression’s Northeast Region office and one of National Oilwell Varco’s locations, which has sites worldwide
The park has been professionally maintained with newer construction for most of the buildings
Close proximity to several energy sites, such as MarkWest Energy Partners' Canonsburg location

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in Canonsburg, PA, minutes from I-79 Exit 43; 7 miles from I-70. Southpointe Business Park is approximately six miles from the Property.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Chartiers Industrial Park was developed in 2012 on a 27.98-acre lot located in the Washington County submarket of Pittsburgh, to suit like-businesses moving to the area for Marcellus and Utica Shale drilling. The property is surrounded by several oil and gas drilling sites. Set on 28 acres, each of the seven buildings contains large outdoor and indoor areas for manufacturing, storage and ample on-site parking for trucks and employees, attached office space, ceiling height of between 25 to 32’ in height, drive-through bays with 16’ oversized doors and concrete aprons, efficient T-3 lighting, and select buildings contain five and ten-ton crane ways and wash bays.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 7-Building, 105,000 SF Flex Space Industrial Park for Sale
